# Client Account Balances Reports

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/client-account-balances-reports/

## Category
04 Clients

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
REPORTS
Client Account Balances Reports
IN THIS ARTICLE
Client Account Usage Report
Client Account Balances Report
Client Account Deposits Report

If Client Account Balances is enabled for your account, the following Client Account Balances reports are available in the Reports app.

Client Account Balances reports can help you track account balance usage, current account balances, and more.

Link copied
Client Account Usage Report

The Client Account Usage report includes account balance usage details such as sale # and client name.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Client Account Usage report.

Column

	

Description




Date

	

The date the account balance was used.




Sale #

	

The sale where the account balance was used.




Client

	

The client whose account balance was used.




Amount

	

The amount of the account balance that was used. Negative amounts include payments that were refunded or reversed to the client account balance.

Link copied
Client Account Balances Report

The Client Account Balances report includes current client account balances.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Client Account Balances report.

Column

	

Description




Client

	

The client's name.




Amount

	

The client's current account balance.

Link copied
Client Account Deposits Report

The Client Account Deposits report includes account balance deposit details such as sale # and client name. This report does not include manual adjustments to client account balances.

The table below provides more information on the different columns in the Client Account Deposits report.

Column

	

Description




Date

	

The date the account balance deposit was completed.




Sale #

	

The sale where the account balance deposit was completed.




Client

	

The client whose account balance was updated.




Amount

	

The account balance deposit amount.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
